Item.text: HTTP View data visualizer parses and displays HTTP protocol requests and responses.
Not enough resources for the packet
Packet too small to be a valid packet
Adapter not binded or was disconnected
The size of the packet is too large for the NIC, or possibly the NIC indicated an erroneous packet transmission to its driver.
The underlying driver is currently resetting the NIC.

Message.description: Error text: Packet size limit exceeded

Message.value: structure definition is not found. Network Monitor is unable to display any results.

Message.description: Error: Packet size larger than Adapter MTU size
Message.value: Packet ({packetno}): Size of packet ({size}) larger than Adapter MTU size ({maxsize}).
